Author Notes

KrazyKrow Author/Creator Email

12/28/2012

on December 28, 2012

EDIT: No guys, you aren’t crazy. This is a different page than was up a day ago. This was going to be a book-only bonus chapter, but I’m going to post it now instead. That will give us time to make the next chapter, with Captain Alberta, in full colour. Stay tooned.

Chapter 14 is here! Rocio is doing pencils for this one.

Also, Mr. Webby is now shipping, get him at the store!
